data.name: Apple_Test_Description
data.value: Installs, runs and uninstalls a given iOS/tvOS/watchOS/xrOS/MacCatalyst test application bundle containing TestRunner in a target device/simulator.

data.name: Apple_Test_Usage
data.value: apple test --app=... --output-directory=... --target=... [OPTIONS] [-- [RUNTIME ARGUMENTS]]

data.name: Apple_Run_Description
data.value: Installs, runs and uninstalls a given iOS/tvOS/watchOS/xrOS/MacCatalyst application bundle in a target device/simulator and tries to detect the exit code.

data.name: Apple_Install_Description
data.value: Installs a given iOS/tvOS/watchOS/xrOS/MacCatalyst application bundle in a target device/simulator

data.name: Apple_Uninstall_Description
data.value: Uninstalls a given iOS/tvOS/watchOS/xrOS/MacCatalyst application bundle from a target device/simulator

data.name: Apple_JustTest_Description
data.value: Runs an already installed iOS/tvOS/watchOS/xrOS/MacCatalyst test application containing a TestRunner in a target device/simulator.

data.name: Apple_JustRun_Description
data.value: Runs an already installed iOS/tvOS/watchOS/xrOS/MacCatalyst test application containing a TestRunner in a target device/simulator and tries to detect the exit code.

data.name: Apple_Device_Description
data.value: Finds the UDID of a device/simulator for given target

data.name: Apple_Mlaunch_Description
data.value: Invoke bundled mlaunch with given arguments

data.name: Apple_State_Description
data.value: Print information about the current machine, such as host machine info and device status

data.name: Android_Test_Description
data.value: Executes test .apk on an Android device, waits up to a given timeout, then copies files off the device and uninstalls the test app

data.name: Android_Device_Description
data.value: Get ID of the device compatible with a given .apk / architecture

data.name: Android_Install_Description
data.value: Install an .apk on an Android device without running it

data.name: Android_Run_Description
data.value: Run tests using an already installed .apk on an Android device

data.name: Android_Uninstall_Description
data.value: Uninstall an .apk from an Android device

data.name: Android_Adb_Description
data.value: Invoke bundled adb with given arguments

data.name: Android_State_Description
data.value: Print information about the current machine, such as host machine info and device status

data.name: AndroidHeadless_Test_Description
data.value: Executes test executable on an Android device, waits up to a given timeout, then copies files off the device and uninstalls the test app

data.name: AndroidHeadless_Install_Description
data.value: Install a test folder to an Android device without running it

data.name: AndroidHeadless_Run_Description
data.value: Run tests using an already installed executable on an Android device

data.name: AndroidHeadless_Uninstall_Description
data.value: Uninstall a test folder from an Android device

data.name: Wasm_Test_Description
data.value: Executes tests on WASM using a selected JavaScript engine

data.name: Wasm_TestBrowser_Description
data.value: Executes tests on WASM using a browser

data.name: Wasm_WebServer_Description
data.value: Starts a webserver

data.name: Wasi_Test_Description
data.value: Executes tests on WASI using a selected engine

data.name: Apple_Simulators_List_Description
data.value: Lists available simulators

data.name: Apple_Simulators_Find_Description
data.value: Finds whether given simulators are installed and outputs list of missing ones (returns 0 when none missing)

data.name: Apple_Simulators_Install_Description
data.value: Installs given simulators

data.name: Apple_Simulators_Reset_Description
data.value: Resets given iOS/tvOS simulator (wipes it clean)

data.name: Error_UnknownArguments
data.value: Unknown arguments: {0}

data.name: Error_RequiredArgumentMissing
data.value: Required argument {0} was not supplied

data.name: Error_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid value '{0}' supplied for {1}. Valid values are:{2}

data.name: Error_MustBeInteger
data.value: {0} must be an integer

data.name: Error_MustBeTimespan
data.value: {0} must be an integer - a number of seconds, or a timespan (00:30:00)

data.name: Error_EmptyValue
data.value: Empty value supplied to {0}

data.name: Error_UnexpectedFailure
data.value: Unexpected failure argument: {0}

data.name: Help_Usage
data.value: usage: {0}

data.name: Help_CommandNotAvailable
data.value: The '{0}' command is not available on non-OSX platforms!

data.name: Help_NoHelpAvailable
data.value: No help available for command '{0}'. Allowed commands are 'apple', 'wasm', 'wasi' and 'android'

data.name: Help_UnknownSubCommand
data.value: Unknown sub-command '{0}'.

data.name: Help_AllSupportedSubCommands
data.value: All supported sub-commands:

data.name: Help_RunForMoreDetails
data.value: Run 'xharness {0} {{command}} --help' for more details

data.name: Log_XHarnessCommandIssued
data.value: [{0}] XHarness command issued: {1}

data.name: Log_XHarnessExitCode
data.value: XHarness exit code: {0}{1}

data.name: Arg_Target_Description
data.value: Test target (device/simulator and OS)

data.name: Arg_AppPath_Description
data.value: Path to application bundle

data.name: Arg_OutputDirectory_Description
data.value: Directory to which the simulator/device output will be saved

data.name: Arg_Timeout_Description
data.value: Timeout in seconds. Default is {0} seconds

data.name: Arg_LaunchTimeout_Description
data.value: Timeout in seconds for the app to start. Default is {0} seconds

data.name: Arg_DeviceName_Description
data.value: Name of the device/simulator to use

data.name: Arg_Verbosity_Description
data.value: Logging verbosity level

data.name: Arg_Help_Description
data.value: Show this message and exit
